summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Shortit free trial link flow bug fixes. All 52 group notification tests passed, all 5 increment calls now include 'total' key, Shortit paths have proper notifyGroup calls and remaining links messages, syntax validation passed, and health endpoint returns ok.
passed_tests: All 52 tests in test_group_notifications.js passed (100% success rate)
All 5 increment(totalShortLinks, 'total') calls include 'total' key (no undefined key errors)
No increment(totalShortLinks) calls without key exist (verified by grep)
Shortit random link path has notifyGroup call for 'Custom Short Link Created!'
Shortit custom link path has notifyGroup call for 'Custom Short Link Created!'
Shortit random link path has decrement(freeShortLinksOf) and linksRemaining message
Shortit custom link path has decrement(freeShortLinksOf) and linksRemaining message
auto-promo.js has no syntax errors (node --check passed)
GET /api/health returns ok with all services running
All existing backend functionality working (5/5 backend tests passed)
